settings.heading: License FAQ
settings.content: The Commercial License allows you to use our theme on an unlimited number of Shopify stores. Upon purchase, you will receive a License PDF as proof of your authorization for commercial use.

settings.heading: Buy On Etsy
settings.content: Click here to shop on Etsy

settings.heading: Can I customize the theme after purchasing it?
settings.row_content: Yes, our themes are fully customizable! You can use the Shopify editor to adjust colors, fonts, layouts, and more. For advanced customizations, you can modify the code or hire a developer to tailor it further to your needs.

settings.heading: Do your themes work with Shopify 2.0?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! All our themes are built on Shopify 2.0, offering flexible sections, improved speed, and enhanced customization options to give you the best experience.

settings.heading: Will I receive support after purchasing the theme?
settings.row_content: Yes, we provide dedicated support to ensure your theme works seamlessly. If you encounter any issues, reach out to us through email or our contact form, and weâ€™ll assist you promptly.

settings.heading: Will this theme work with my apps?
settings.row_content: Yes, our themes are designed to be compatible with most Shopify apps. However, if you encounter any issues, our support team is here to assist you in resolving app compatibility concerns.

settings.heading: Are the themes mobile-friendly?
settings.row_content: Yes, all our themes are fully responsive, meaning they are optimized to look great on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

settings.heading: Are refunds available after purchasing a theme?
settings.row_content: Since our themes are digital products, we do not offer refunds. Please review the demo before purchasing.

settings.heading: Can I use the theme for multiple Shopify stores?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can use the theme for multiple stores, but reselling or redistributing the theme is strictly prohibited.
